## DiffPatch type

A patch is a list of operations that can transform one [DiffValue](doc/markdown/./base.diffvalue.md) into another.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type DiffPatch = (DiffOpSet | DiffOpDel | DiffOpArr)[];
```
**References:** [DiffOpSet](doc/markdown/./base.diffopset.md)<!-- -->, [DiffOpDel](doc/markdown/./base.diffopdel.md)<!-- -->, [DiffOpArr](doc/markdown/./base.diffoparr.md)
